name: Frog Symphony Simulator
description:
Made for the ROC Game Dev "Growth" Jam.

Your are Frog Girl. Keep your frog buddies grown by feeding them worms. Feed the same colored frogs to make them sing. Watch out: your frogs will get hungry and shrink down if not fed. See how many you can feed before time runs out!

3 stages with 3 songs.

Press any key to start.

Arrow keys move.

Space bar feeds.
